section.title: 软件名称
section.programlisting: <para> <application>Word Perfect</application> is one of several word processors to claim support for <acronym>SGML</acronym>. </para>
section.para: Word Perfect is one of several word processors to claim support for SGML .

section.title: 硬件名称
section.programlisting: <para> The <acronym>IRQ</acronym> of the <hardware>SCSI Controller</hardware> can be set to 7, 11, or 15. The factory default setting is 7. </para>
section.para: The IRQ of the SCSI Controller can be set to 7, 11, or 15. The factory default setting is 7.

section.title: 数据库
section.programlisting: <para> The <database>ProjectStatus</database> database has been updated. Please note that <database class='field'>Year</database> has been extended to four digits. </para>
section.para: The ProjectStatus database has been updated. Please note that Year has been extended to four digits.

section.title: 类名
section.programlisting: <para> All user-interface components must be descendants of the <classname>Widget</classname> class. </para>
section.para: All user-interface components must be descendants of the Widget class.

section.title: 变量名
section.programlisting: <para> In Perl, <varname>@ARGV</varname> contains the command line parameters used when the script was run. </para>
section.para: In Perl, @ARGV contains the command line parameters used when the script was run.

section.programlisting: <para> In ACL, <constant>main::PCS</constant> contains the path component separator character. </para> <para> The maximum legal length for a path name is <constant class='limit'>PATH_MAX</constant>, defined in <filename class='headerfile'>limits.h</filename>. </para>
section.para: In ACL, main::PCS contains the path component separator character.
The maximum legal length for a path name is PATH_MAX , defined in limits.h .

section.title: 命令
section.programlisting: <para> In <acronym>UNIX</acronym>, <command>ls</command> is used to get a directory listing. </para>
section.para: In UNIX , ls is used to get a directory listing.

section.title: 参数
section.programlisting: <para> Using the <parameter class='command'>/w</parameter> parameter on the DOS <command>dir</command> command prints a wide directory listing. </para>
section.para: Using the /w parameter on the DOS dir command prints a wide directory listing.

section.title: 环境变量
section.programlisting: <para> In order to translate public identifiers into local system identifiers, <application>Jade</application> and <application>SP</application> read the catalog files pointed to by <envar>SGML_CATALOG_FILES</envar>. </para>
section.para: In order to translate public identifiers into local system identifiers, Jade and SP read the catalog files pointed to by SGML_CATALOG_FILES .

section.title: 输入提示
section.programlisting: <para> Enter your user name when the system presents the <prompt>login:</prompt> prompt. </para>
section.para: Enter your user name when the system presents the login: prompt.

section.title: 用户输入
section.programlisting: <para> At the system prompt, enter <userinput>xyzzy</userinput> to gain supervisor access to the system. </para>
section.para: At the system prompt, enter xyzzy to gain supervisor access to the system.

section.title: 主机名
section.programlisting: <para> For many years, O'Reilly's primary web server, <ulink url="http://www.oreilly.com/">http://www.oreilly.com/</ulink>, was hosted by <application>WN</application> on <systemitem class="systemname">helio.oreilly.com</systemitem>. </para>
section.para: For many years, O'Reilly's primary web server, http://www.oreilly.com/ , was hosted by WN on helio.oreilly.com .

section.title: 文件名
section.programlisting: <para> The symbolic constants for error numbers are defined in <filename class='headerfile'>errno.h</filename> in <filename class='directory'>/usr/include/sys</filename>. </para>
section.para: The symbolic constants for error numbers are defined in errno.h in /usr/include/sys .

section.title: 命令参数可选项
section.programlisting:
<para> The <option>-a</option> option on the <acronym>UNIX</acronym> <command>ls</command> command or the <option>/r</option> option on the <acronym>DOS</acronym> <command>attrib</command> command, for example. </para>
<synopsis> ls <optional><option>-abcCdfFgilLmnopqrRstux1</option></optional> <optional>names</optional> </synopsis>
section.para: The -a option on the UNIX ls command or the /r option on the DOS attrib command, for example.

section.title: 终端输出
section.programlisting: <para> The output from the date command, <computeroutput>Sun Nov 16, 1997 21:03:29</computeroutput>, uses fixed-width fields so that it can easily be parsed. </para>
section.para: The output from the date command, Sun Nov 16, 1997 21:03:29 , uses fixed-width fields so that it can easily be parsed.
